name: Kodo Labs
description:
We are a team of engineers who love building great products for the web. Our primary development platform is Ruby on Rails.
We have strong expertise in building web apps and utilize our knowledge, skills and best tools to deliver outstanding results to our clients. We go extra mile by analyzing your requirements and suggesting best implementation.
We are striving for long-term partnership and 70% of our new projects come from same clients. Not only we help you with building your product but we also evolve and maintain it over it's life cycle.
